alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 10 at 5:26PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Virga shower will produce strong gusty winds across southeastern El Paso and north central Pueblo Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 524 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking virga showers that were producing strong gusty winds across southern El Paso and Northern Pueblo counties. Gusts to 40 to 50 mph will be possible. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern El Paso and north central Pueblo Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
